capabilities.description:
__Read-only__ A list of the possible capabilities of this image.

- `cloud-init`. The image supports the cloud-init multi-distribution method with our [Metadata service](https://www.linode.com/docs/products/compute/compute-instances/guides/metadata/#troubleshoot-metadata-and-cloud-init). This only applies to public images.

- `distributed-sites`. Whether the image can be used in distributed compute regions. Compared to a core compute region, distributed compute regions offer limited functionality, but they're globally distributed. Your image can be geographically closer to you, potentially letting you deploy it quicker. See [Regions and images](https://techdocs.akamai.com/cloud-computing/docs/images#regions-and-images) for complete details.

created_by.description: __Read-only__ The name of the user who created this image, or `linode` for public images.

deprecated.description: __Filterable__, __Read-only__ Whether this image is deprecated. Only public images can be deprecated.

description.description: A detailed description of this image.

eol.description: __Read-only__ The date of the public image's planned removal from service. This is `null` for private images.

expiry.description: __Read-only__ Only images created automatically from a deleted compute instance (type=automatic) expire. This is `null` for private images.

id.description: __Read-only__ The unique identifier for each image.

is_public.description: __Filterable__, __Read-only__ Revealed as `true` if the image is a public distribution image. Private, account-specific images are listed as `false`.

label.description: __Filterable__ A short description of the image.

regions.description: __Read-only__ Details on the regions where this image is stored. See [Regions and images](https://techdocs.akamai.com/cloud-computing/docs/images#regions-and-images) for full details on support for `regions`.

region.description: The unique identifier for the core compute region where this image is stored.

status.description: The status of the image in this `region`. Possible values are `available`, `creating`, `pending`, `pending deletion`, `pending replication`, or `replicating`.

size.description: __Filterable__, __Read-only__ The minimum size in MB this image needs to deploy.

status.description:
__Filterable__, __Read-only__ The current status of the image. Possible values are `available`, `creating`, and `pending_upload`.

> ðŸ“˜
>
> The `+order_by` and `+order` operators are not available when [filtering](https://techdocs.akamai.com/linode-api/reference/filtering-and-sorting) on this key.

tags.description: __Filterable__ Tags used for organizational purposes. A tag can be from 3 to 100 characters long, and an image can have a maximum of 500 total tags.

total_size.description:
__Read-only__ The total size in bytes of all instances of this image, in all `regions`.

> ðŸ“˜
>
> This object is empty for existing images. It's intended for use with future functionality.

type.description: __Filterable__, __Read-only__ How the image was created. Create a `manual` image at any time. An `automatic` image is created automatically from a deleted compute instance.

updated.description: __Read-only__ When this image was last updated.

vendor.description: __Filterable__, __Read-only__ The upstream distribution vendor. This is `null` for private images.
